# version-migrator

> Migrate OSSA manifests between versions with zero downtime

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: migration
- **Manifest**: version-migrator.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Migrate OSSA manifests between versions (v0.3.x â†’ v0.4.x).
Handles breaking changes, deprecated fields, and new features.
Validates before and after migration.

capabilities:
